itemDisplayName: 3-Tier Red Hat Linux Solution on Azure
description: This template allows you to deploy a 3 Tier architecture using 'Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3' virtual machines. Architecture includes Virtual Network, external and internal load balancers, Jump VM, NSGs etc along with multiple RHEL Virtual machines in each tier
summary: This template allows you to deploy a 3 Tier architecture using 'Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.3' virtual machines. Architecture includes external and internal load balancers, Jump VM, NSGs etc along with multiple RHEL Virtual machines in each tier
